headline: Vacuum Grease Market Projected at USD 239.55 Million by 2032, Fueled by Demand in Scientific Instruments and Lab Equipment | Research by SNS Insider
summary: Growing reliance on precision instruments and increased demand for vacuum-sealed systems in electronics and biotech are significantly boosting vacuum grease consumption.Austin, July 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Vacuum Grease Market Size was valued at USD 148.92 million in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 239.55 million by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 6.12% over the forecast period of 2025-2032.
